collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Mignon [sound recording] / music by Ambroise Thomas ; libretto by Michel Carré and Jules Barbier.
pageContext.collection_description: Risë Stevens (Mignon) ; Josephine Antoine (Philline) ; Helen Olheim (Frédéric) ; Richard Crooks (Wilhelm) ; Ezio Pinza (Lothario) ; Alessio De Paolis (Laërte) ; John Gurney (Jarno, Antonio) ; Metropolitan Opera Orchestra and Chorus ; Wilfrid Pelletier, conductor ; Milton Cross, broadcast announcer.
